Title: Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines or How I Flew from London to Paris in 25 hours 11 minutes
Actors: Stuart Whitman, Sarah Miles, James Fox, Alberto Sordi
Plot: Hoping to push Britain to the forefront of aviation, a London publisher organizes an international air race across the English Channel, but must contend with two entrants vying for his daughter, as well as national rivalries and cheating.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 7 nominations.
